ar: وَالَّذِينَ إِذَا فَعَلُوا فَحِشَةً أَوْ ظَلَمُوا
en: And those who, when they commit an immorality or wrong
remember Allah and seek forgiveness for their sins -
and who can forgive sins except Allah?
and who can forgive sins except Allah? -

ar: وَلَمْ يُصِرُّوا عَلَى مَا فَعَلُوا وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُونَ
en: and [who] do not persist in what they have done while they know.
their reward is forgiveness from their Lord
and gardens beneath which rivers flow [in Paradise],
and excellent is the reward of the [righteous] workers.
and excellent is the reward of the [righteous] workers.
